data.eml:eml: A new species of nectar-feeding bat, genus Lonchophylla, from the Caatinga of Brazil (Chiroptera, Phyllostomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moratelli, Ricardo, Dias, Daniela (2015): A new species of nectar-feeding bat, genus Lonchophylla, from the Caatinga of Brazil (Chiroptera, Phyllostomidae). ZooKeys 514: 73-91, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.514.10013, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.514.10013
